response.overview: Mahan is a frustrated youth who establishes an organization called Namadhu Naadu Namadhu Urimai Through this, he decides to fight inefficient politicians and expose the corruption. What circumstances led him to fight against the system? How youngsters like Karthik and Sanjana helped him in this process? Will, he succeeds in this tough path? To know this, you have to watch the film on the silver Screen
response.title: Namadhu Naadu Namadhu Urimai
